def Load(widget): from Benner.Tecnologia.Common import EntityState if widget.ProviderWidget <> None and (widget.ProviderWidget.Entity == None or widget.ProviderWidget.Entity.State == EntityState.Initialized): widget.Hidden = True return
import clr clr.AddReference("Benner.Erp.Web") from Benner.Erp.Web import AuthorizationHelper
podeInserir = AuthorizationHelper.PodeInserirEntidade(widget.View.EntityDefinition.Name) aditivo = widget.ProviderWidget.Entity
podeAlterar = aditivo.PermiteAlterarAssinantesAditivo
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = podeAlterar and podeInserir widget.View.Commands["Edit"].Visible = podeAlterar widget.View.Commands["Delete"].Visible = podeAlterar
